snippet: Officials said that the farm workers had been killed by a drug-trafficking paramilitary group known as Los Rastrojos, or the scraps.
abstract: Colombian officials say drug-trafficking paramilitary group known as Los Rastrojos killed 10 farm workers in state of Antioquia.
lead_paragraph: Officials said that the farm workers had been killed by a drug-trafficking paramilitary group known as Los Rastrojos, or the scraps.

headline.main: Colombia: Gunmen Kill 10 Farm Workers, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Colombia: Gunmen Kill 10 Farm Workers, Police Say
